about_the_game:
This is a wonderful DLC that helps support Nyanco-chan! (ฅ'ω'ฅ)

This Artbook DLC contains about 10,000 artworks of cat girl, Nyanco!

The Artbook DLC can be found in the folder where the game is installed.

Some of the images contain explicit sexual content intended for adults only.

The Artbook DLC can continue to be updated as long as there is support from fans who love Nyanco.

Note :
Owners of the Artbook DLC can use its contents freely for personal use. You can also use the artbook towards furthering your AI learning. However, you must comply with the laws of your country. For commercial use, please contact us in advance for specific scope and use approval. Thank you for your support.

content_descriptors.notes:
Themes include:
- Single female consensual sex with one or multiple male partners
- Open, friendly attitude towards a promiscuous anime character
- Sexual relations with non-human fantasy species
- Skimpy revealing outfits

name: Nyanco Impact - Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
